short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your VidBinge.com experience with just one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the VidBinge extension, you unlock a treasure chest of additional content sources that are otherwise restricted due to your location or other web rules (like a VIP list at a club). Our extension enables you  to connect to additional libraries that our site cannot connect to alone, meaning more movies and TV shows are at your fingertips!

Use the Vid Binge extension to:
• Greatly increase the list of sources available.
• Start using the website without any friction.
• Enjoy other supported websites or self-hosts.

Even without the extension, you can: 
• Save your show progress.
• Bookmark shows and movies for later watching.
• Synchronize your data across multiple devices.

Happy streaming!
